name: SuperBoy
description:
Super Boy its a 3D shooter project inspired by 16 bits shooters. (made with Unity)

*some sound effects and musics are there only for demo purpose and will be removed soon.

Controls: 

WASD or Arrows to move;

Shift to run;

Mouse to rotate;

Mouse button hold to charge or press to fire;

v1.1 :

-Changed control scheme;

-Level 1 complete;

-Added "charge shot";
